column4: If anyone here is familiar with DNS and ubuntu server I have a few questions.
Ok so I have a domain name from NoIp.com
when im outside my lan it works fine, i can connect with the domain name.
I wanted to set up a way to use the domain in my lan
as of right on I have to type in my 192... Private address
Be patient. Sometimes it takes a while for nameservers to get updated info.
